channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumping rubbish, 2nd January
item.description:
There is a significant problem with rubbish and fly-tipping in this area. Bins have been overturned and waste is being left scattered on the ground rather than properly contained. The amount of rubbish has built up to the point that it is unsightly, unhygi

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eastway, Hackney, London

item.title: Gate lock cut to allow cars through dead end - junction of Sussex Way & Tollington Way N7, 2nd January
item.description:
Someone has cut the lock on the fire Access gate at junction of Sussex Way and Tollington Way N7 to allow cars to drive through. Please fix the lock in the gate post so they can't cut the lock again. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sussex Way, Holloway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Neighbours above fly tipping construction waste into my bins, 2nd January
item.description:
On 26 December 2025, the owner of the property above (Flat 2, 121 Heavitree Road, SE18 1SU) fly tipped construction waste into my general and recycling bins. I asked them to stop and they refused. I have video footage of them doing this via my Ring camera. The general bins were collected, but on 2 January 2025 the binmen advised me that they could not take the recycling bins.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heavitree Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black ice, 2nd January
item.description:
The BLACK ice is in the joining section of beaverwood road to Perry street. It is very dangerous as cars are going usually speed in Perry street and if you are driving out of beaverwood road the black ice means you can not stop before the white lines and continue to slip out onto Perry street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beaverwood Road, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous black ice covering these roads, 2nd January
item.description:
The black ice along Bournewood Road, Kynaston Road, and Northfield Avenue is a dangerous risk to drivers and pedestrians. Issue needs to be fixed as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bournewood Road, Poverest, Greater London
